title: Enhancing Instructional Design Competencies: Understanding Preference Evaluation Methodologies Through Iterative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary statistics and economic decision-making concepts
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the role of repeated learning in preference assessment methodologies
Learners can apply systematic procedures to analyze preferences across diverse decision-making scenarios
Learners can design assessment tools that identify and mitigate anchoring effects and bias factors after recognizing them
Learners can observe and interpret preference convergence patterns through iterative learning design
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
